ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
local CONFIG_PANEL_GUID = 'd35363'
local configPanel = getObjectFromGUID(CONFIG_PANEL_GUID)
local CARD_SPAWNER_GUID = '4412c0'
local cardSpawner = getObjectFromGUID(CARD_SPAWNER_GUID)
local inteviewRoom = {
    ['Apostrophe'] = { position = { { 21.00, 1.54, 10.50 }, { 21.00, 1.54, 5.00 }, { 21.00, 1.54, -0.50 } }, GUID = {}, rotation = { { 0.00, 180.00, 180.00 }, { 0.00, 180.00, 0.00 }, { 0.00, 180.00, 0.00 } } },
}
local welcomeRoom = '6a328b'
local contrainRoom = '2af664'
local yithienWatcher = { GUID = '8f8689', position = { 24.00, 1.52, 10.50 }, rotation = { 0, 180, 0 } }
local yithianBodyCardList = {}

local outOfPlayPile = {
    ['encounterDeck'] = {
        position = { 30.50, 3.61, -3.00 } },
    ['victory'] = {
        position = { 30.50, 1.51, 2.50 } }
}
local janitor = { rotation = { 0, 180, 0 }, GUID = 'b178e1' }


local locations = {
    ['Crescent'] = { position = { 19.00, 1.52, 19.00 }, rotation = { 0, 180, 0 } }, --fait
    ['Triangle'] = { position = { 11.50, 1.53, 24.00 }, rotation = { 0, 180, 0 } },
    ['SlantedEquals'] = { position = { 19.00, 1.52, 28.50 }, rotation = { 0, 180, 0 } },
    ['Heart'] = { position = { -8.50, 1.52, 10.00 }, rotation = { 0, 180, 0 } },
    ['Circle'] = { position = { -8.00, 1.52, 19.50 }, rotation = { 0, 180, 0 } },
    ['Star'] = { position = { 0.00, 1.52, 24.00 }, rotation = { 0, 180, 0 } },
    ['Hourglass'] = { position = { -8.50, 1.52, 0.50 }, rotation = { 0, 180, 0 } },

}



function onLoad()
    createButton()
    math.randomseed(os.time())
    self.randomize()
    self.shuffle()
    completeAllLocationsTable()
    buildYithianBodyList()
    buildJanitorSpawn()
end

function createButton()
    self.createButton({
        label = "Mise en place",
        click_function = "question1",
        function_owner = self,
        position = { 0, 0.3, 1.8 },
        rotation = { 0, 0, 0 },
        height = 350,
        width = 1800,
        font_size = 250,
        color = { 0, 0, 0 },
        font_color = { 1, 1, 1 },
        tooltip = "Mise en place"
    })
end

function question1()
    broadcastToAll("Les investigateurs ont-ils coopéré ou résisté aux Yithiens ? ", 'Yellow')
    self.removeButton(0)
    self.createButton({
        label = "Coopéré",
        click_function = "cooperate",
        function_owner = self,
        position = { -1.3, 0.3, 1.8 },
        rotation = { 0, 0, 0 },
        height = 400,
        width = 1200,
        font_size = 250,
        color = { 0, 0, 0 },
        font_color = { 1, 1, 1 },
    })
    self.createButton({
        label = "Résisté",
        click_function = "resist",
        function_owner = self,
        position = { 1.3, 0.3, 1.8 },
        rotation = { 0, 0, 0 },
        height = 400,
        width = 1200,
        font_size = 250,
        color = { 0, 0, 0 },
        font_color = { 1, 1, 1 },
    })
end

function cooperate()
    broadcastToAll('Chaque investigateur gagne un indice', { 0, 0.75, 0.75 })
    local n = hasValue(inteviewRoom['Apostrophe'].GUID, welcomeRoom)
    inteviewRoom['Apostrophe'].GUID[n], inteviewRoom['Apostrophe'].GUID[1] = inteviewRoom['Apostrophe'].GUID[1],
        inteviewRoom['Apostrophe'].GUID[n]
    setUp()
end

function resist()
    yithienWatcher.position = outOfPlayPile['victory'].position
    local n = hasValue(inteviewRoom['Apostrophe'].GUID, contrainRoom)
    inteviewRoom['Apostrophe'].GUID[n], inteviewRoom['Apostrophe'].GUID[1] = inteviewRoom['Apostrophe'].GUID[1],
        inteviewRoom['Apostrophe'].GUID[n]
    setUp()
end

function setUp()
    for i = 1, 3 do
        local tab = inteviewRoom['Apostrophe']
        local pickedUpCard = self.takeObject({
            guid = tab.GUID[i],
            rotation = tab.rotation[i]
        })
        pickedUpCard.setPositionSmooth(tab.position[i], false, false)
    end

    local pickedUpCard = self.takeObject({
        guid = yithienWatcher.GUID,
        rotation = yithienWatcher.rotation
    })
    pickedUpCard.setPositionSmooth(yithienWatcher.position, false, false)
    local numberOfInvestigators = configPanel.call("getInvCount")
    local yithianBodyToSpawn = {}
    for i = 1, numberOfInvestigators do
        table.insert(yithianBodyToSpawn, yithianBodyCardList[i])
    end
    local spreadValue = #yithianBodyToSpawn
    local pos_x
    if spreadValue % 2 ~= 0 then
        local n = (spreadValue - 1) / 2
        pos_x = -(3.66 * n + 1.83)
    else
        local n = spreadValue / 2
        pos_x = -3.66 * n
    end
    Wait.time(function()
        local position = { x = 7.5 + pos_x, y = 3.49, z = -11.5 }
        for i, guid in ipairs(yithianBodyToSpawn) do
            local pickedUpCard = self.takeObject({
                guid = guid,
                rotation = { 0.00, 90.00, 0.00 }
            })
            pickedUpCard.setPositionSmooth(position, false, false)
            position.x = position.x + 3.66
        end
    end, 1)
    Wait.time(function()
        local encounterDeck = getOutOfPlayPile('encounterDeck')
        encounterDeck.shuffle()
        broadcastToAll('Mise en place terminée', { 0, 0.75, 0.75 })
    end, 3)
    self.clearButtons()
end

function act1b()
    for icon, card in pairs(locations) do
        local pickedUpCard = self.takeObject({
            guid = card.GUID,
            rotation = card.rotation
        })
        pickedUpCard.setPositionSmooth(card.position, false, false)
    end
    local pickedUpCard = self.takeObject({
        guid = janitor.GUID,
        rotation = janitor.rotation
    })
    pickedUpCard.setPositionSmooth(janitor.position, false, false)


    Wait.time(function()
        local encounterDeck = getOutOfPlayPile('encounterDeck')
        encounterDeck.shuffle()
        broadcastToAll('Mise en place terminée', { 0, 0.75, 0.75 })
    end, 3)
    self.clearButtons()
end

---comment
---@param icon any string matching with an icon name
---@param number any number of card that must be chosen

function chooseAmongstInAtable(tab, number)
    local row = {}
    for i = 1, number do
        local j = math.random(1, #tab)
        local k = math.random(1, #row + 1)
        table.insert(row, k, tab[j])
        table.remove(tab, j)
    end
    return row
end

function getOutOfPlayPile(pile)
    local position = {
        x = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[1],
        y = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[2] - 2,
        z = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[3]
    }
    local hitList = Physics.cast({
        origin       = position,
        direction    = { 0, 1, 0 },
        type         = 3,
        size         = { 3, 3, 3 },
        max_distance = 0,
        debug        = false,
    })

    for _, object in ipairs(hitList) do
        local obj = object.hit_object
        if obj.type == "Deck" then
            return obj
        end
    end
end

function completeAllLocationsTable()
    local containedObjects = self.getData().ContainedObjects
    for k, obj in pairs(containedObjects) do
        if obj.Name == 'Card' then
            local metadata = Global.call('getMetadata', obj)
            if metadata then
                if
                    metadata.locationFront ~= nil then
                    local icon = metadata.locationFront.icons
                    if metadata.locationFront.icons == 'Apostrophe' then
                        table.insert(inteviewRoom[icon].GUID, obj.GUID)
                    else
                        locations[icon].GUID = obj.GUID
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function buildYithianBodyList()
    local containedObjects = self.getData().ContainedObjects
    for k, obj in pairs(containedObjects) do
        if obj.Name == 'Card' then
            local metadata = Global.call('getMetadata', obj)
            if metadata then
                if
                    metadata.type == "Investigator" then
                    table.insert(yithianBodyCardList, obj.GUID)
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function hasValue(tab, val)
    for i, v in ipairs(tab) do
        if v == val then return i end
    end
    return false
end

function buildJanitorSpawn()
    local locationIcons = {}
    for k, v in pairs(locations) do
        table.insert(locationIcons, k)
    end

    local containedObjects = self.getData().ContainedObjects
    for k, obj in pairs(containedObjects) do
        if obj.Name == 'Card' then
            local metadata = Global.call('getMetadata', obj)
            if metadata then
                if
                    (metadata.locationFront ~= nil) then
                    if hasValue(locationIcons, metadata.locationFront.icons) then
                        local ico = metadata.locationFront.icons
                        janitor.position = {
                            x = locations[ico].position[1],
                            y = locations[ico].position[2],
                            z =
                                locations[ico].position[3] + 3.5
                        }
                        return
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function onObjectLeaveContainer(container, object)
    local metadata = Global.call('getMetadata', object.getData())
    if metadata then
        if metadata.id ~= nil then
            if metadata.id == '04241' then
                broadcastToAll("Bouton de mise en place de l'acte 1b disponible sur le conteneur", { 0, 1, 0.75 })
                self.clearButtons()
                self.createButton({
                    label = "Acte 1b",
                    click_function = "act1b",
                    function_owner = self,
                    position = { 0, 0.3, 1.8 },
                    rotation = { 0, 0, 0 },
                    height = 400,
                    width = 1200,
                    font_size = 250,
                    color = { 0, 0, 0 },
                    font_color = { 1, 1, 1 },
                })
            end
        end
    end
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model_Bag
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
-- Utility memory bag by Directsun
-- Version 2.7.0
-- Fork of Memory Bag 2.0 by MrStump
--
-- Want to contribute? Create an issue or fork the code on GitHub and submit a pull request:
-- https://github.com/sunflowermans/TTS-UtilityMemoryBag


function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {["ml"]=memoryList}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
        local data = bagObj.lua_script_state
        if data ~= nil then
            local j = JSON.decode(data)
            if j ~= nil and j.ml ~= nil then
                for guid, entry in pairs(j.ml) do
                    memoryList[guid] = entry
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function updateMemoryWithMoves()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    --get the first transposed object's coordinates
    local obj = getObjectFromGUID(moveGuid)

    -- p1 is where needs to go, p2 is where it was
    local refObjPos = memoryList[moveGuid].pos
    local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(obj.getPosition(), refObjPos, nil)
    local movedRotation = obj.getRotation()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        memoryList[guid].pos.x = entry.pos.x - deltaPos.x
        memoryList[guid].pos.y = entry.pos.y - deltaPos.y
        memoryList[guid].pos.z = entry.pos.z - deltaPos.z
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.x = movedRotation.x
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.y = movedRotation.y
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.z = movedRotation.z
    end

    --theList[obj.getGUID()] = {
    --    pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
    --    rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
    --    lock=obj.getLock()
    --}
    moveList = {}
end

function onload(saved_data)

    fresh = true
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        --Set up information off of loaded_data
        memoryList = loaded_data.ml
    else
        --Set up information for if there is no saved saved data
        memoryList = {}

    end

    moveList = {}
    moveGuid = nil

    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        fresh = false
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
end


--Beginning Setup


--Make setup button
 function createSetupButton()
    self.createButton({

--Triggered by Transpose button
function buttonClick_transpose()
    moveGuid = nil
    broadcastToAll("Select one object and move it- all objects will move relative to the new location", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    moveList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects(true)
    createSetupActionButtons(true)
end

--Triggered by setup button,
function buttonClick_setup()
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects(false)
    createSetupActionButtons(false)
end

function getAllObjectsInMemory()
    local objTable = {}
    local curObj = {}

    for guid in pairs(memoryListBackup) do
        curObj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        table.insert(objTable, curObj)
    end

    return objTable
    -- return getAllObjects()
end

--Creates selection buttons on objects
function createButtonsOnAllObjects(move)
    buttonIndexMap = {}
    local howManyButtons = 0

    local objsToHaveButtons = {}
    if move == true then
        objsToHaveButtons = getAllObjectsInMemory()
    else
        objsToHaveButtons = getAllObjects()
    end

    for _, obj in ipairs(objsToHaveButtons) do
        if obj ~= self then
            --On a normal bag, the button positions aren't the same size as the bag.
            globalScaleFactor = 1* 1/self.getScale().x
            --Super sweet math to set button positions
            local selfPos = self.getPosition()
            local objPos = obj.getPosition()
            local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(selfPos, objPos, obj)
            local objPos = rotateLocalCoordinates(deltaPos, self)
            objPos.x = -objPos.x * globalScaleFactor
            objPos.y = objPos.y * globalScaleFactor + 2
            objPos.z = objPos.z * globalScaleFactor * 0.9
            --Workaround for custom PDFs
            if obj.Book then
                objPos.y = objPos.y + 0.5
            end
            --Offset rotation of bag
            local rot = self.getRotation()
            rot.y = -rot.y + 180
            --Create function
            local funcName = "selectButton_" .. howManyButtons
            local func = function() buttonClick_selection(obj, move) end
            local color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
            local colorMove = {0,0,1,0.6}
            if move == true then
                color = colorMove
            end
            self.setVar(funcName, func)
            self.createButton({
                click_function=funcName, function_owner=self,
                position=objPos, rotation=rot, height=500, width=500,
                color=color,
            })
            buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()] = howManyButtons
            howManyButtons = howManyButtons + 1
        end
    end
end

--Creates submit and cancel buttons
function createSetupActionButtons(move)
    self.createButton({
        label="Annuler", click_function="buttonClick_cancel", function_owner=self,

    if move == false then

      })

        self.createButton({
            label="Sélection", click_function="editDragSelection", function_owner=self,

        })

        if fresh == false then
                self.createButton({

                })
                self.createButton({

            end

        self.createButton({

--During Setup


--Checks or unchecks buttons
function buttonClick_selection(obj, move)
    local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
    local colorMove = {0,0,1,0.6}
    local color = {0,1,0,0.6}

    previousGuid = selectedGuid
    selectedGuid = obj.getGUID()

    theList = memoryList
    if move == true then
        theList = moveList
        if previousGuid ~= nil and previousGuid ~= selectedGuid then
            local prevObj = getObjectFromGUID(previousGuid)
            prevObj.highlightOff()
            self.editButton({index=previousIndex, color=colorMove})
            theList[previousGuid] = nil
        end
        previousIndex = index
    end

    if theList[selectedGuid] == nil then
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        --Adding pos/rot to memory table
        local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
        --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
        theList[obj.getGUID()] = {
            pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
            rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
            lock=obj.getLock(),
            tint=obj.getColorTint()
        }
        obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
    else
        color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
        if move == true then
            color = colorMove
        end
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        theList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

function editDragSelection(bagObj, player, remove)
    local selectedObjs = Player[player].getSelectedObjects()
    if not remove then
        for _, obj in ipairs(selectedObjs) do
            local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
            --Ignore if already in the memory list, or does not have a button
            if index and not memoryList[obj.getGUID()] then
                self.editButton({index=index, color={0,1,0,0.6}})
                --Adding pos/rot to memory table
                local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
                --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
                memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = {
                    pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
                    rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
                    lock=obj.getLock(),
                    tint=obj.getColorTint()
                }
                obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
            end
        end
    else
        for _, obj in ipairs(selectedObjs) do
            local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
            if index and memoryList[obj.getGUID()] then
                color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
                self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
                memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
                obj.highlightOff()
            end
        end
    end
end

--Cancels selection process
function buttonClick_cancel()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    moveList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Sélection annulée", {1,1,1})
    moveGuid = nil
end

--Saves selections
function buttonClick_submit()
    fresh = false
    if next(moveList) ~= nil then
        for guid in pairs(moveList) do
            moveGuid = guid
        end
        if memoryListBackup[moveGuid] == nil then
            broadcastToAll("Item selected for moving is not already in memory", {1, 0.25, 0.25})
        else
            broadcastToAll("Moving all items in memory relative to new objects position!", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
            self.clearButtons()
            self.clearInputs()
            createMemoryActionButtons()
            local count = 0
            for guid in pairs(moveList) do
                moveGuid = guid
                count = count + 1
                local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
                if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
            end
            updateMemoryWithMoves()
            updateSave()
            buttonClick_place()
        end
    elseif next(memoryList) == nil and moveGuid == nil then
        memoryList = memoryListBackup
        broadcastToAll("No selections made.", {0.75, 0.25, 0.25})
    end
    combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
    moveGuid = nil
end

function combineTables(first_table, second_table)
    for k,v in pairs(second_table) do first_table[k] = v end
end

function buttonClick_add()
    fresh = false
    combineTables(memoryList, memoryListBackup)
    broadcastToAll("Adding internal bags and selections to existing memory", {0.25, 0.75, 0.25})
    combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end

function buttonClick_remove()
    broadcastToAll("Removing Selected Entries From Memory", {1.0, 0.25, 0.25})
    self.clearButtons()

    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do

        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Removed", {1,1,1})

end

function buttonClick_setNew()
    broadcastToAll("Setting new position relative to items in memory", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        guid = obj.guid
        if memoryListBackup[guid] ~= nil then
            count = count + 1
            memoryListBackup[guid].pos = obj.getPosition()
            memoryListBackup[guid].rot = obj.getRotation()
            memoryListBackup[guid].lock = obj.getLock()
            memoryListBackup[guid].tint = obj.getColorTint()
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    updateSave()
end

    ---      font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.75,0.75,1}
    ---

--Sends objects from bag/table to their saved position/rotation
function buttonClick_place()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        --If obj is out on the table, move it to the saved pos/rot
        if obj ~= nil then
            obj.setPositionSmooth(entry.pos)
            obj.setRotationSmooth(entry.rot)
            obj.setLock(entry.lock)
            obj.setColorTint(entry.tint)
        else
            --If obj is inside of the bag
            for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
                if bagObj.guid == guid then
                    local item = self.takeObject({
                        guid=guid, position=entry.pos, rotation=entry.rot, smooth=false
                    })
                    item.setLock(entry.lock)
                    item.setColorTint(entry.tint)
                    break
                end
            end
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll("Objets placés", {1,1,1})
end

--Recalls objects to bag from table
function buttonClick_recall()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then self.putObject(obj) end
    end
    broadcastToAll("Objets rangés", {1,1,1})
end


--Utility functions


--Find delta (difference) between 2 x/y/z coordinates
function findOffsetDistance(p1, p2, obj)
    local yOffset = 0
    if obj ~= nil then
        local bounds = obj.getBounds()
        yOffset = (bounds.size.y - bounds.offset.y)
    end
    local deltaPos = {}
    deltaPos.x = (p2.x-p1.x)
    deltaPos.y = (p2.y-p1.y) + yOffset
    deltaPos.z = (p2.z-p1.z)
    return deltaPos
end

--Used to rotate a set of coordinates by an angle
function rotateLocalCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
    local objPos, objRot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
    local angle = math.rad(objRot.y)
    local x = desiredPos.x * math.cos(angle) - desiredPos.z * math.sin(angle)
    local z = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle) + desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
    --return {x=objPos.x+x, y=objPos.y+desiredPos.y, z=objPos.z+z}
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

function rotateMyCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
    local angle = math.rad(obj.getRotation().y)
    local x = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle)
    local z = desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

--Duplicates a table (needed to prevent it making reference to the same objects)
function duplicateTable(oldTable)
    local newTable = {}
    for k, v in pairs(oldTable) do
        newTable[k] = v
    end
    return newTable
end

--Moves scripted highlight from all objects
function removeAllHighlights()
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
    local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
    return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
end


--[[
This object provides access to a variable stored on the "Global script".
The variable holds the GUIDs for every Utility Memory Bag in the scene.
Example:
{'805ebd', '35cc21', 'fc8886', 'f50264', '5f5f63'}
--]]
AllMemoryBagsInScene = {
    NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE = "_UtilityMemoryBag_AllMemoryBagsInScene"
}

function AllMemoryBagsInScene:add(guid)
    local guids = Global.getTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE) or {}
    table.insert(guids, guid)
    Global.setTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE, guids)
end

function AllMemoryBagsInScene:getGuidList()
    return Global.getTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE) or {}
end

Left click - Increase
Right click - Decrease
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
MIN_VALUE = -99
MAX_VALUE = 999

function onload(saved_data)
    light_mode = true
    val = 0

    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        light_mode = loaded_data[1]
        val = loaded_data[2]
    end

    createAll()
end

function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {light_mode, val}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function createAll()
    s_color = {0,0,0,100}

    if light_mode then
        f_color = {1,1,1,100}
    else
        f_color = {0,0,0,100}
    end



    self.createButton({
      label=tostring(val),
      click_function="add_subtract",
      function_owner=self,
      position={0,0.05,0.1},
      height=600,
      width=1000,
      alignment = 3,
      scale={x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5},
      font_size=600,
      font_color=f_color,
      color={1,1,1,0}
      })




    if light_mode then
        lightButtonText = "[ Set dark ]"
    else
        lightButtonText = "[ Set light ]"
    end
 
end

function removeAll()
    self.removeInput(0)
    self.removeInput(1)
    self.removeButton(0)
    self.removeButton(1)
    self.removeButton(2)
end

function reloadAll()
    removeAll()
    createAll()

    updateSave()
end

function swap_fcolor(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    light_mode = not light_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_align(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    center_mode = not center_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function editName(_obj, _string, value) 
    self.setName(value)
    setTooltips()
end

function add_subtract(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(val + mod, MIN_VALUE), MAX_VALUE)
    if val ~= new_value then
        val = new_value
      updateVal()
        updateSave()
    end
end

function updateVal()

    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        label = tostring(val),

        })
end

function reset_val()
    val = 0
    updateVal()
    updateSave()
end

function setTooltips()
    self.editInput({
        index = 0,
        value = self.getName(),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        value = tostring(val),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

function null()
end

function keepSample(_obj, _string, value) 
    reloadAll()
end

    params.tooltip = "Vous préférez chercher Alejandro vous-même"
    self.editButton(params)
end

function police()
    acts['actCD'].GUID = acts['actCD']['police']
    question3()
end

function byourself()
    acts['actCD'].GUID = acts['actCD']['byourself']
    question3()
end

function question3()
    broadcastToAll("Avez-vous écouté l'histoire d'Ichtaca ou est-elle partie sans vous ?", 'Yellow')
    local params = {}
    params.index = 0
    params.label = "Écouté"
    params.click_function = "listen"
    params.tooltip = "Vous avez écouté l'histoire d'Ichtaca"
    self.editButton(params)
    params.index = 1
    params.label = "Partie"
    params.click_function = "left"
    params.tooltip = "Ichtaca est partie sans vous"
    self.editButton(params)
end

function listen()
    acts['actEF'].GUID = acts['actEF']['listen']
    question4()
end

function left()
    acts['actEF'].GUID = acts['actEF']['left']
    question4()
end

function question4()
    broadcastToAll("Allez-vous retrouver la source anonyme ou découvrir la racine du problème ?", 'Yellow')
    local params = {}
    params.index = 0
    params.label = "La source"
    params.click_function = "source"
    params.tooltip = "Vous souhaitez retrouver la source anonyme"
    self.editButton(params)
    params.index = 1
    params.label = "La racine"
    params.click_function = "root"
    params.tooltip = "Vous souhaitez découvrir la racine du problème"
    self.editButton(params)
end

function source()
    acts['actGH'].GUID = acts['actGH']['source']
    setUp()
end

function root()
    acts['actGH'].GUID = acts['actGH']['root']
    setUp()
end

function setUp()
    for act, params in pairs(acts) do
        for i, GUID in ipairs(params.GUID) do
            local position = { x = params.position[1], y = params.position[2] + i / 10, z = params.position[3] }
            local pickedUpCard = self.takeObject({
                guid = GUID,
                rotation = params.rotation
            })
            pickedUpCard.setPositionSmooth(position, false, false)
        end
    end
    for name, card in pairs(storyAssets) do
        local placedAsset = serachcardInDeck(card)
        if placedAsset then
            broadcastToAll("la carte " .. card.message .. " a été retirée du deck de son propriétaire", { 0, 0.75, 0.75 })
        else
            local pickedUpCard = self.takeObject({
                guid = card.alernateGUID,
                rotation = card.rotation
            })
            pickedUpCard.setPositionSmooth(card.position, false, false)
            broadcastToAll(
                "la carte " .. card.message .. " est introuvable dans les decks, un autre exemplaire a été mis de côté",
                { 1, 0, 0.25 })
        end
    end
    self.clearButtons()
    Wait.time(function()
        local encounterDeck = getOutOfPlayPile('encounterDeck')
        encounterDeck.shuffle()
        broadcastToAll('Mise en place terminée', { 0, 0.75, 0.75 })
    end, 3)
end

---@param cardID string
---@param position table
---@param rotation table

function serachcardInDeck(data)
    local colorsInGame = positionHandler.call('getColorsInGame')
    local params = {}
    params.zone = 'Deck'
    for i, color in ipairs(colorsInGame) do
        params.playerColor = color
        local objects = positionHandler.call('getObjectsInPlayerZone', params)
        for _, obj in ipairs(objects) do
            if obj.type == "Deck" then
                local deck = obj
                local containedObjects = deck.getData().ContainedObjects
                for _, card in ipairs(containedObjects) do
                    local metadata = Global.call('getMetadata', card)
                    if metadata then
                        if metadata.id ~= nil and metadata.id == data.cardID then
                            local pickedUpcard = deck.takeObject({
                                guid = card.GUID,
                                rotation = data.rotation
                            })
                            pickedUpcard.setPositionSmooth(data.position, false, false)
                            return true
                        end
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
    return false
end

function chooseOneAmongst(icon)
    local containedObjects = self.getData().ContainedObjects
    local tab = {}
    for k, obj in pairs(containedObjects) do
        if obj.Name == 'Card' then
            local metadata = Global.call('getMetadata', obj)
            if metadata then
                if
                    metadata.locationFront ~= nil then
                    if metadata.locationFront.icons == icon then
                        table.insert(tab, obj.GUID)
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
    local n = #tab
    local i = math.random(1, n)
    locations[icon].GUID = tab[i]
end

function chooseAmongstInAtable(tab, number)
    local row = {}
    for i = 1, number do
        local j = math.random(1, #tab)
        local k = math.random(1, #row + 1)
        table.insert(row, k, tab[j])
        table.remove(tab, j)
    end
    return row
end

function getOutOfPlayPile(pile)
    local position = {
        x = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[1],
        y = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[2] - 2,
        z = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[3]
    }
    local hitList = Physics.cast({
        origin       = position,
        direction    = { 0, 1, 0 },
        type         = 3,
        size         = { 3, 3, 3 },
        max_distance = 0,
        debug        = false,
    })

    for _, object in ipairs(hitList) do
        local obj = object.hit_object
        if obj.type == "Deck" then
            return obj
        end
    end
end

function hasValueBis(tab, string)
    for i, v in ipairs(tab) do
        if v[2] == string then
            return i
        end
    end
    return false
end

function hasValue(tab, string)
    for i, v in ipairs(tab) do
        if v == string then
            return i
        end
    end
    return false
end

function initiateChosenPile()
    local containedObjects = self.getData().ContainedObjects

    for act, tab in pairs(acts) do
        for k, v in pairs(tab) do
            if k ~= 'position' and k ~= 'rotation' then
                for l, obj in pairs(containedObjects) do
                    if obj.Name == 'Card' then
                        local n = hasValueBis(v, obj.GUID)
                        if n then
                            tab[k] = v[n]
                            tab[k][1], tab[k][3] = tab[k][3], tab[k][1]
                            break
                        end
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function checkGUIDinChosenPile()
    local containedObjects = self.getData().ContainedObjects
    local listGUID = {}
    for l, obj in pairs(containedObjects) do
        if obj.Name == 'Card' then
            table.insert(listGUID, obj.GUID)
        end
    end
    for act, tab in pairs(acts) do
        for k, v in pairs(tab) do
            if k ~= 'position' and k ~= 'rotation' then
                for _, GUID in ipairs(v) do
                    if not hasValue(listGUID, GUID) then
                        print(GUID)
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

Left click - Increase
Right click - Decrease
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
MIN_VALUE = -99
MAX_VALUE = 999

function onload(saved_data)
    light_mode = true
    val = 0

    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        light_mode = loaded_data[1]
        val = loaded_data[2]
    end

    createAll()
end

function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {light_mode, val}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function createAll()
    s_color = {0,0,0,100}

    if light_mode then
        f_color = {1,1,1,100}
    else
        f_color = {0,0,0,100}
    end



    self.createButton({
      label=tostring(val),
      click_function="add_subtract",
      function_owner=self,
      position={0,0.05,0.1},
      height=600,
      width=1000,
      alignment = 3,
      scale={x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5},
      font_size=600,
      font_color=f_color,
      color={1,1,1,0}
      })




    if light_mode then
        lightButtonText = "[ Set dark ]"
    else
        lightButtonText = "[ Set light ]"
    end
 
end

function removeAll()
    self.removeInput(0)
    self.removeInput(1)
    self.removeButton(0)
    self.removeButton(1)
    self.removeButton(2)
end

function reloadAll()
    removeAll()
    createAll()

    updateSave()
end

function swap_fcolor(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    light_mode = not light_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_align(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    center_mode = not center_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function editName(_obj, _string, value) 
    self.setName(value)
    setTooltips()
end

function add_subtract(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(val + mod, MIN_VALUE), MAX_VALUE)
    if val ~= new_value then
        val = new_value
      updateVal()
        updateSave()
    end
end

function updateVal()

    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        label = tostring(val),

        })
end

function reset_val()
    val = 0
    updateVal()
    updateSave()
end

function setTooltips()
    self.editInput({
        index = 0,
        value = self.getName(),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        value = tostring(val),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

function null()
end

function keepSample(_obj, _string, value) 
    reloadAll()
end

    metadata = JSON.decode(self.getGMNotes())

end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model_Bag
ContainedObjects.Nickname: V-A : Le Cœur des Anciens, Partie 1
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
-- Utility memory bag by Directsun
-- Version 2.7.0
-- Fork of Memory Bag 2.0 by MrStump
--
-- Want to contribute? Create an issue or fork the code on GitHub and submit a pull request:
-- https://github.com/sunflowermans/TTS-UtilityMemoryBag


function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {["ml"]=memoryList}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
        local data = bagObj.lua_script_state
        if data ~= nil then
            local j = JSON.decode(data)
            if j ~= nil and j.ml ~= nil then
                for guid, entry in pairs(j.ml) do
                    memoryList[guid] = entry
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function updateMemoryWithMoves()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    --get the first transposed object's coordinates
    local obj = getObjectFromGUID(moveGuid)

    -- p1 is where needs to go, p2 is where it was
    local refObjPos = memoryList[moveGuid].pos
    local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(obj.getPosition(), refObjPos, nil)
    local movedRotation = obj.getRotation()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        memoryList[guid].pos.x = entry.pos.x - deltaPos.x
        memoryList[guid].pos.y = entry.pos.y - deltaPos.y
        memoryList[guid].pos.z = entry.pos.z - deltaPos.z
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.x = movedRotation.x
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.y = movedRotation.y
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.z = movedRotation.z
    end

    --theList[obj.getGUID()] = {
    --    pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
    --    rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
    --    lock=obj.getLock()
    --}
    moveList = {}
end

function onload(saved_data)

    fresh = true
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        --Set up information off of loaded_data
        memoryList = loaded_data.ml
    else
        --Set up information for if there is no saved saved data
        memoryList = {}

    end

    moveList = {}
    moveGuid = nil

    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        fresh = false
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
end


--Beginning Setup


--Make setup button
 function createSetupButton()
    self.createButton({
      label="Config", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
      position={0,0.1,-2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
      font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
 end

--Triggered by Transpose button
function buttonClick_transpose()
    moveGuid = nil
    broadcastToAll("Select one object and move it- all objects will move relative to the new location", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    moveList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects(true)
    createSetupActionButtons(true)
end

--Triggered by setup button,
function buttonClick_setup()
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects(false)
    createSetupActionButtons(false)
end

function getAllObjectsInMemory()
    local objTable = {}
    local curObj = {}

    for guid in pairs(memoryListBackup) do
        curObj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        table.insert(objTable, curObj)
    end

    return objTable
    -- return getAllObjects()
end

--Creates selection buttons on objects
function createButtonsOnAllObjects(move)
    buttonIndexMap = {}
    local howManyButtons = 0

    local objsToHaveButtons = {}
    if move == true then
        objsToHaveButtons = getAllObjectsInMemory()
    else
        objsToHaveButtons = getAllObjects()
    end

    for _, obj in ipairs(objsToHaveButtons) do
        if obj ~= self then
            --On a normal bag, the button positions aren't the same size as the bag.
            globalScaleFactor = 1* 1/self.getScale().x
            --Super sweet math to set button positions
            local selfPos = self.getPosition()
            local objPos = obj.getPosition()
            local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(selfPos, objPos, obj)
            local objPos = rotateLocalCoordinates(deltaPos, self)
            objPos.x = -objPos.x * globalScaleFactor
            objPos.y = objPos.y * globalScaleFactor + 2
            objPos.z = objPos.z * globalScaleFactor * 0.9
            --Workaround for custom PDFs
            if obj.Book then
                objPos.y = objPos.y + 0.5
            end
            --Offset rotation of bag
            local rot = self.getRotation()
            rot.y = -rot.y + 180
            --Create function
            local funcName = "selectButton_" .. howManyButtons
            local func = function() buttonClick_selection(obj, move) end
            local color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
            local colorMove = {0,0,1,0.6}
            if move == true then
                color = colorMove
            end
            self.setVar(funcName, func)
            self.createButton({
                click_function=funcName, function_owner=self,
                position=objPos, rotation=rot, height=500, width=500,
                color=color,
            })
            buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()] = howManyButtons
            howManyButtons = howManyButtons + 1
        end
    end
end

--Creates submit and cancel buttons
function createSetupActionButtons(move)
    self.createButton({
        label="Annuler", click_function="buttonClick_cancel", function_owner=self,
      position={-0.7,0.1,2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
      font_size=145, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })

    self.createButton({
        label="Valider", click_function="buttonClick_submit", function_owner=self,
        position={-0.7,0.3,2.6}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })

    if move == false then
      self.createButton({
          label="Ajouter", click_function="buttonClick_add", function_owner=self,
          position={0.7,0.3,2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
          font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.25,1,0.25}
      })

        self.createButton({
            label="Sélection", click_function="editDragSelection", function_owner=self,
            position={-0.7,0.3,3.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
            font_size=125, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
        })

        if fresh == false then
                self.createButton({
                    label="Mise à jour", click_function="buttonClick_setNew", function_owner=self,
                    position={0.7,0.3,3.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
                    font_size=105, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.75,0.75,1}
                })
                self.createButton({
                    label="Retirer", click_function="buttonClick_remove", function_owner=self,
                    position={0.7,0.3,2.6}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
                    font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,0.25,0.25}
                })
            end
        end

        self.createButton({
            label="Reset", click_function="buttonClick_reset", function_owner=self,
            position={0,0.3,-2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
            font_size=165, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
        })
    end


--During Setup


--Checks or unchecks buttons
function buttonClick_selection(obj, move)
    local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
    local colorMove = {0,0,1,0.6}
    local color = {0,1,0,0.6}

    previousGuid = selectedGuid
    selectedGuid = obj.getGUID()

    theList = memoryList
    if move == true then
        theList = moveList
        if previousGuid ~= nil and previousGuid ~= selectedGuid then
            local prevObj = getObjectFromGUID(previousGuid)
            prevObj.highlightOff()
            self.editButton({index=previousIndex, color=colorMove})
            theList[previousGuid] = nil
        end
        previousIndex = index
    end

    if theList[selectedGuid] == nil then
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        --Adding pos/rot to memory table
        local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
        --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
        theList[obj.getGUID()] = {
            pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
            rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
            lock=obj.getLock(),
            tint=obj.getColorTint()
        }
        obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
    else
        color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
        if move == true then
            color = colorMove
        end
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        theList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

function editDragSelection(bagObj, player, remove)
    local selectedObjs = Player[player].getSelectedObjects()
    if not remove then
        for _, obj in ipairs(selectedObjs) do
            local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
            --Ignore if already in the memory list, or does not have a button
            if index and not memoryList[obj.getGUID()] then
                self.editButton({index=index, color={0,1,0,0.6}})
                --Adding pos/rot to memory table
                local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
                --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
                memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = {
                    pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
                    rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
                    lock=obj.getLock(),
                    tint=obj.getColorTint()
                }
                obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
            end
        end
    else
        for _, obj in ipairs(selectedObjs) do
            local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
            if index and memoryList[obj.getGUID()] then
                color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
                self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
                memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
                obj.highlightOff()
            end
        end
    end
end

--Cancels selection process
function buttonClick_cancel()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    moveList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Sélection annulée", {1,1,1})
    moveGuid = nil
end

--Saves selections
function buttonClick_submit()
    fresh = false
    if next(moveList) ~= nil then
        for guid in pairs(moveList) do
            moveGuid = guid
        end
        if memoryListBackup[moveGuid] == nil then
            broadcastToAll("Item selected for moving is not already in memory", {1, 0.25, 0.25})
        else
            broadcastToAll("Moving all items in memory relative to new objects position!", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
            self.clearButtons()
            self.clearInputs()
            createMemoryActionButtons()
            local count = 0
            for guid in pairs(moveList) do
                moveGuid = guid
                count = count + 1
                local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
                if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
            end
            updateMemoryWithMoves()
            updateSave()
            buttonClick_place()
        end
    elseif next(memoryList) == nil and moveGuid == nil then
        memoryList = memoryListBackup
        broadcastToAll("No selections made.", {0.75, 0.25, 0.25})
    end
    combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
    moveGuid = nil
end

function combineTables(first_table, second_table)
    for k,v in pairs(second_table) do first_table[k] = v end
end

function buttonClick_add()
    fresh = false
    combineTables(memoryList, memoryListBackup)
    broadcastToAll("Adding internal bags and selections to existing memory", {0.25, 0.75, 0.25})
    combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end

function buttonClick_remove()
    broadcastToAll("Removing Selected Entries From Memory", {1.0, 0.25, 0.25})
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        memoryListBackup[guid] = nil
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Removed", {1,1,1})
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    updateSave()
end

function buttonClick_setNew()
    broadcastToAll("Setting new position relative to items in memory", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        guid = obj.guid
        if memoryListBackup[guid] ~= nil then
            count = count + 1
            memoryListBackup[guid].pos = obj.getPosition()
            memoryListBackup[guid].rot = obj.getRotation()
            memoryListBackup[guid].lock = obj.getLock()
            memoryListBackup[guid].tint = obj.getColorTint()
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    updateSave()
end

--Resets bag to starting status
function buttonClick_reset()
    fresh = true
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createSetupButton()
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Tool Reset", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end


--After Setup


--Creates recall and place buttons
function createMemoryActionButtons()
    self.createButton({
        label="Placer", click_function="buttonClick_place", function_owner=self,
        position={0.7,0.1,2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Ranger", click_function="buttonClick_recall", function_owner=self,
        position={-0.7,0.1,2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Config", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.1,-2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    ---    self.createButton({
    ---      label="Bouger", click_function="buttonClick_transpose", function_owner=self,
    ---      position={-2,0.3,0.8}, rotation={0,270,0}, height=350, width=800,
    ---      font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.75,0.75,1}
    ---
end

--Sends objects from bag/table to their saved position/rotation
function buttonClick_place()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        --If obj is out on the table, move it to the saved pos/rot
        if obj ~= nil then
            obj.setPositionSmooth(entry.pos)
            obj.setRotationSmooth(entry.rot)
            obj.setLock(entry.lock)
            obj.setColorTint(entry.tint)
        else
            --If obj is inside of the bag
            for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
                if bagObj.guid == guid then
                    local item = self.takeObject({
                        guid=guid, position=entry.pos, rotation=entry.rot, smooth=false
                    })
                    item.setLock(entry.lock)
                    item.setColorTint(entry.tint)
                    break
                end
            end
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll("Objets placés", {1,1,1})
end

--Recalls objects to bag from table
function buttonClick_recall()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then self.putObject(obj) end
    end
    broadcastToAll("Objets rangés", {1,1,1})
end


--Utility functions


--Find delta (difference) between 2 x/y/z coordinates
function findOffsetDistance(p1, p2, obj)
    local yOffset = 0
    if obj ~= nil then
        local bounds = obj.getBounds()
        yOffset = (bounds.size.y - bounds.offset.y)
    end
    local deltaPos = {}
    deltaPos.x = (p2.x-p1.x)
    deltaPos.y = (p2.y-p1.y) + yOffset
    deltaPos.z = (p2.z-p1.z)
    return deltaPos
end

--Used to rotate a set of coordinates by an angle
function rotateLocalCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
    local objPos, objRot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
    local angle = math.rad(objRot.y)
    local x = desiredPos.x * math.cos(angle) - desiredPos.z * math.sin(angle)
    local z = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle) + desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
    --return {x=objPos.x+x, y=objPos.y+desiredPos.y, z=objPos.z+z}
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

function rotateMyCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
    local angle = math.rad(obj.getRotation().y)
    local x = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle)
    local z = desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

--Duplicates a table (needed to prevent it making reference to the same objects)
function duplicateTable(oldTable)
    local newTable = {}
    for k, v in pairs(oldTable) do
        newTable[k] = v
    end
    return newTable
end

--Moves scripted highlight from all objects
function removeAllHighlights()
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
    local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
    return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
end


--[[
This object provides access to a variable stored on the "Global script".
The variable holds the GUIDs for every Utility Memory Bag in the scene.
Example:
{'805ebd', '35cc21', 'fc8886', 'f50264', '5f5f63'}
--]]
AllMemoryBagsInScene = {
    NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE = "_UtilityMemoryBag_AllMemoryBagsInScene"
}

function AllMemoryBagsInScene:add(guid)
    local guids = Global.getTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE) or {}
    table.insert(guids, guid)
    Global.setTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE, guids)
end

function AllMemoryBagsInScene:getGuidList()
    return Global.getTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE) or {}
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
-- Code for bag to identify text tool objects
movableTextTool_cowgoesmoo33 = true

-- Number of characters before the text box width expands.
EXPAND_INTERVAL = 20

-- This table controls what is passed between save/load
data = {}

function onLoad(saved_data)
  if saved_data ~= '' then
    data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
    if data.text ~= '' then
      self.interactable = data.interactable
      staticMode()
      return
    end
  else
    data = {size=200, color=Color(0,0,0), text='', interactable=true,
        enter_to_finish=false, autolock=false, autolift=false,
        hover_height=0.05, box_transparency=1}
  end

  inputMode()
end

-- True if in the middle of delay after pressing Enter (with enter_to_finish on)
finishing = false
function input_func(obj, color, input, stillEditing)
  local params = getBox(input)
  if params then
    params.value = input
    self.editInput(params)
  end

  if not stillEditing then
    data.text = input
    updateState()
    if input ~= '' then staticMode(color) end
  elseif data.enter_to_finish then
    -- If enter is pressed: remove last newline and force finish
    if not finishing and input:sub(-1) == '\n' then
      finishing = true
      -- Delay to avoid user's Enter keypress being detected (opens chat box)
      Wait.frames(function()
        input = input:sub(1, -2)
        data.text = input
        updateState()
        if input ~= '' then staticMode(color) else inputMode() end
        finishing = false
      end, 10)
    end
  end
end

-- When the inpupt box appears and lets the player type in it.
function inputMode()
  self.clearContextMenu()
  self.clearInputs()
  self.clearButtons()

  local size = getBox(data.text, true)

  self.createInput({
    input_function = "input_func",
    function_owner = self,
    label          = "Type Here",
    alignment      = 3,
    position       = {x=0, y=data.hover_height, z=0},
    rotation       = {0, 180, 0},
    width          = size.width,
    height         = size.height,
    color          = getBackground(data.color),
    font_color     = data.color,
    font_size      = data.size,
    value          = data.text,
  })

  self.addContextMenuItem('Color: Object Tint', function(color)
    applyMultiple(color, 'setColor')
  end)
  self.addContextMenuItem('Color: Player', function(color)
    applyMultiple(color, 'setColor', {Color.fromString(color)})
  end)
  self.addContextMenuItem('Color: Black', function(color)
    applyMultiple(color, 'setColor', {Color(0,0,0)})
  end)
  self.addContextMenuItem('Color: White', function(color)
    applyMultiple(color, 'setColor', {Color(1,1,1)})
  end)
  self.addContextMenuItem('Size: Increase', function(color)
    applyMultiple(color, 'changeSize', {50})
  end, true)
  self.addContextMenuItem('Size: Decrease', function(color)
    applyMultiple(color, 'changeSize', {-50})
  end, true)
end

-- When the input box disappears and displays the text.
function staticMode(player)
  self.clearContextMenu()
  if data.autolock then
    self.locked = true
  end
  if self.getInputs() and #self.getInputs() ~= 0 then
    self.removeInput(0)
  end

  -- Clear from selecting player
  if player then
    self.removeFromPlayerSelection(player)
  end

  local displayText = data.text
  if data.enter_to_finish then
    displayText = displayText:gsub('%[n%]', '\n')
  end

  self.createButton({
    label=displayText,
    click_function="none",
    function_owner=self,
    position={0,data.hover_height,0}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=0, width=0,
    font_color=data.color, font_size=data.size
  })

  self.addContextMenuItem('Edit Text', function(color)
    self.removeFromPlayerSelection(color)
    inputMode()
  end)
  self.addContextMenuItem('Clear', function(color)
    applyMultiple(color, 'clear', _, true)
  end)
  self.addContextMenuItem('Color: Object Tint', function(color)
    applyMultiple(color, 'setColor')
  end)
  self.addContextMenuItem('Color: Player', function(color)
    applyMultiple(color, 'setColor', {Color.fromString(color)})
  end)
  self.addContextMenuItem('Color: Black', function(color)
    applyMultiple(color, 'setColor', {Color(0,0,0)})
  end)
  self.addContextMenuItem('Color: White', function(color)
    applyMultiple(color, 'setColor', {Color(1,1,1)})
  end)
  self.addContextMenuItem('Size: Increase', function(color)
    applyMultiple(color, 'changeSize', {50})
  end, true)
  self.addContextMenuItem('Size: Decrease', function(color)
    applyMultiple(color, 'changeSize', {-50})
  end, true)
  self.addContextMenuItem('Permanently Attach', attemptAttach)
  self.addContextMenuItem('Permalock', function(color)
    applyMultiple(color, 'permalock', _, true)
  end)
end

function changeSize(params)
  local delta = params[1]
  local newSize = data.size + delta
  if newSize > 800  or newSize < 50 then
    return
  end
  data.size = newSize
  updateState()
  if self.getButtons() and #self.getButtons() ~= 0 then
    self.editButton({font_size=data.size})
  else
    local size = getBox(data.text, true)
    self.editInput({width=size.width, height=size.height, font_size=data.size})
  end
end

function setColor(params)
  if params and params[1] then
    data.color = params[1]
  else
    data.color = self.getColorTint():setAt('a', 1) -- Take on color of object tint
  end
  updateState()
  if self.getButtons() and #self.getButtons() ~= 0 then
    self.editButton({font_color=data.color})
  else
    self.editInput({font_color=data.color, color=getBackground(data.color)})
  end
end

function getBackground(color) --determines whether to use black or white depending on luminance
  local r,g,b = Color(color):get()

  local lum = 0.2126*r + 0.7152*g + 0.0722*b
  if lum > 0.75 then
    return {0.2,0.2,0.2, data.box_transparency}
  else
    return {1,1,1, data.box_transparency}
  end
end

function clear()
  data.text = ''
  updateState()
  inputMode()
end

function permalock()
  self.interactable = false
  data.interactable = false
  updateState()
end

local target_script = [[
function onLoad(script_state)
  if script_state and script_state ~= '' then
    local state = JSON.decode(script_state)
    for _,entry in ipairs(state) do
      self.createButton(entry)
    end
    self.addContextMenuItem('Clear All Text', function(color)
      self.clearContextMenu()
      self.clearButtons()
      self.script_state = ''
      self.script_code = ''
    end)
  end
end
]]

function attemptAttach(player_color)
  local objs = Player[player_color].getSelectedObjects()
  local attachee
  local attachers = {}
  for _,obj in ipairs(objs) do
    if obj.getVar('movableTextTool_cowgoesmoo33') then
      if obj ~= self then
        table.insert(attachers, obj)
      end
    else
      if attachee then
        broadcastToColor("More than one target selected.", player_color)
        return
      else
        attachee = obj
      end
    end
  end
  if attachee then
    local code = attachee.script_code
    if code and code ~= '' and code ~= target_script then
      broadcastToColor("Warning: script on card has been overriden. Rewind time to undo.", player_color)
    end
    for i,attacher in ipairs(attachers) do
      attacher.call('attach', {target = attachee})
    end
    attach({target = attachee})
    local type, flip = attachee.type, attachee.getRotation().z
    if (type == 'Card' or type == 'Deck') and flip > 175 and flip < 185 then
      broadcastToColor("Warning: text will not display if card or deck is facing down.", player_color)
    end
  else
    broadcastToColor("You must have a target object in your selection (using click-and-drag or Ctrl+Click) to use this option.", player_color)
  end
end

function attach(params)
  local target = params.target
  local displayText = data.text
  if data.enter_to_finish then
    displayText = displayText:gsub('%[n%]', '\n')
  end

  local textRotation = self.getRotation():sub(target.getRotation())
    :add(Vector(180, 0, 180))

  local textPosition = target.positionToLocal(
    self.getPosition():add(Vector(0, data.hover_height, 0))
  )
  textPosition.x = -textPosition.x

  local textScale = {}
  textScale.x = self.getScale().x / target.getScale().x
  textScale.y = self.getScale().x / target.getScale().y
  textScale.z = self.getScale().x / target.getScale().z

  local details = {
    label=displayText,
    click_function="none",
    function_owner=nil,
    position=textPosition,
    rotation=textRotation,
    scale=textScale,
    height=0, width=0,
    font_color=data.color, font_size=data.size
  }

  target.createButton(details)

  local script_state = target.script_state
  if script_state and script_state ~= '' then
    local state = JSON.decode(script_state)
    table.insert(state, details)
    target.script_state = JSON.encode(state)
  else
    target.script_state = JSON.encode({[1]=details})
  end

  target.script_code = target_script

  self.destruct()
end

function applyMultiple(player_color, func_string, params, static_only)
  local objs = Player[player_color].getSelectedObjects()
  for _,obj in ipairs(objs) do
    if obj.getVar('movableTextTool_cowgoesmoo33') then
      if not static_only or obj.call('isStatic') then
        obj.call(func_string, params)
      end
    end
  end
end

function isStatic()
  local input = self.getInputs()
  return not input or #input == 0
end

function getBox(input, force)
  local maxLength, lineCount = EXPAND_INTERVAL, 1
  local lineLength = 0
  for i = 1, #input do
    local c = input:sub(i,i)
    if c == '\n' then
      lineCount = lineCount + 1
      if lineLength > maxLength then maxLength = (math.floor(lineLength / EXPAND_INTERVAL) + 1) * EXPAND_INTERVAL end
      lineLength = 0
    else
      lineLength = lineLength + 1
    end
  end
  if lineLength > maxLength then maxLength = (math.floor(lineLength / EXPAND_INTERVAL) + 1) * EXPAND_INTERVAL end

  newWidth = data.size * maxLength * 0.9
  newHeight = data.size * lineCount + 23

  if force or boxWidth ~= newWidth or boxHeight ~= newHeight then
    boxWidth, boxHeight = newWidth, newHeight
    return {width = boxWidth, height = boxHeight}
  end
  return nil
end

temp_lift = nil
function onPickUp(player_color)
  if data.autolift then
    local player = Player[player_color]
    temp_lift = player.lift_height
    player.lift_height = 0
  end
end

function onDrop(player_color)
  if data.autolift and temp_lift then
    Player[player_color].lift_height = temp_lift
  end
end

-- Should be called every time data is modified, allows info to be saved on copy/paste
function updateState()
  self.script_state = JSON.encode(data)
end

function onSave()
  self.script_state = JSON.encode(data)
  return self.script_state
end

buttonparams = {
   ['easy'] = {label = "Facile", click_function = 'modeEasy', z_i = -0.2},

   ['hard'] = {label = "Difficile", click_function = 'modeHard', z_i = 0.4},
   ['expert'] = {label = "Expert", click_function = 'modeExpert', z_i = 0.7},
   ['standalone'] = {label = "Indépendant", click_function = 'modeStandalone', z_i = 0},
}

function onLoad()

    metadata = JSON.decode(self.getGMNotes())
    buttontable = {}
    for key, value in pairs(buttonparams) do
        if metadata[key] == true then
            table.insert(buttontable,value)
        end
        
    end

    for _, button in pairs(buttontable) do
        local data = {
            click_function = button.click_function, 
            function_owner = self, 
            label = button.label, 
            position = {0, 0.1, button.z_i}, 
            scale = {0.3, 0.5, 0.3}, 
            width = 1500, 
            height = 400, 
            font_size = 250, 
            tooltip = "Chaos bag du mode "..button.label,
            color = {0.5647, 0.4627, 0.2353, 1}, 
            font_color = {0.9041, 0.8313, 0.7356, 1},
            hover_color = {99/255, 85/255, 48/255},
            press_color = {192/255, 152/255, 94/255} }
        self.createButton(data)
        
    end
    jacqueline = getObjectFromGUID(jacqueline_guid)
    chaosdata = jacqueline.getTable('chaosdata')
end

function modeEasy()
    local  params ={}
     params.mode = 'easy'
     params.data = metadata.data
     jacqueline.call('setChaosBag', params)
  
end

function modeNormal()
      local  params ={}
       params.mode = 'normal'
       params.data = metadata.data
       jacqueline.call('setChaosBag', params)
    
end

function modeHard()
    local  params ={}
     params.mode = 'hard'
     params.data = metadata.data
     jacqueline.call('setChaosBag', params)
  
end

function modeExpert()
    local  params ={}
     params.mode = 'expert'
     params.data = metadata.data
     jacqueline.call('setChaosBag', params)
  
end

function modeStandalone()
    local  params ={}
     params.mode = 'standalone'
     params.data = metadata.data
     jacqueline.call('setChaosBag', params)
  
end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
local CARD_SPAWNER_GUID  = '4412c0'
local cardSpawner        = getObjectFromGUID(CARD_SPAWNER_GUID)
local RESET_BUTTON_GUID  = '0e3d38'

local buttonIndex
local save          = true
function onLoad(saved_data)
    if save then
        if saved_data ~= "" then
            local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
            buttonIndex = loaded_data.buttonIndex
            if loaded_data.memoryTable ~= nil then
                memoryTable = loaded_data.memoryTable
            end
        end
    else
        buttonIndex = 0
    end
    updateButtons()
    math.randomseed(os.time())
    self.randomize()
    self.shuffle()
end

function onSave()
    if save then
        self.script_state = JSON.encode({ buttonIndex = buttonIndex - 1, memoryTable = memoryTable })
    else
        self.script_state = JSON.encode({ buttonIndex = 0 })
    end
end

function updateButtons()
    buttonIndex = buttonIndex + 1
    self.clearButtons()
    for i, tab in ipairs(buttonTable[buttonIndex]) do
        self.createButton(tab)
    end
end

function addRessource(N)
    local ressource = ressourceTokenBag.takeObject()
    ressource.setPositionSmooth(kynanMouth, false, false)
    Wait.frames(function()
        for i = 1, N do
            ressource.call("add_subtract")
        end
    end, 1)
end

function setUp()
    buildMemoryTable()
    self.shuffle()
    self.randomize()
    buildchosenLocation()
    local anticCard = anticLocations[chosenLocation]
    local position = outOfPlayPile['explorationPile'].position
    local rotation = outOfPlayPile['explorationPile'].rotation
    if carto then
        position = anticCard.position
        rotation = anticCard.rotation
    end
    local pickUpedCard = self.takeObject({
        guid = anticCard.GUID,
        rotation = rotation
    })
    pickUpedCard.setPositionSmooth(position, false, false)
    for icon, card in pairs(randomExploration) do
        chooseOneAmongst(icon)
        pickUpedCard = self.takeObject({
            guid = card.GUID,
            rotation = card.rotation
        })
        pickUpedCard.setPositionSmooth(card.position, false, false)
    end

    Wait.time(function()
        local encounterDeck = getOutOfPlayPile('encounterDeck')
        encounterDeck.shuffle()
        local explorationPile = getOutOfPlayPile('explorationPile')
        explorationPile.shuffle()
        broadcastToAll('Mise en place terminée', { 0, 0.75, 0.75 })
        Wait.time(function()
            for i = 1, 5 do
                Wait.time(function()
                    returnCard.highlightOn("White", 0.5)
                end, i)
            end
            broadcastToAll("N'oubliez-pas la règle suplémentaire du Renouveau", 'White')
        end, 2)
    end, 2)


    updateButtons()
end

function question3()

function reset()
    local playerCardList = {}
    local objList = getObjectsinZones()
    for _, obj in ipairs(objList) do
        if obj.type == 'Card' and obj.getLock() == false then
            local cardData = obj.getData()
            if isItaPlayerCard(cardData) then
                local row = { data = cardData, metadata = Global.call('getMetadata', cardData) }
                table.insert(playerCardList, row)
            end
            obj.destruct()
        elseif obj.type == "Deck" then
            local DeckContent = obj.getData().ContainedObjects
            for _, cardData in ipairs(DeckContent) do
                if isItaPlayerCard(cardData) then
                    local row = { data = cardData, metadata = Global.call('getMetadata', cardData) }
                    table.insert(playerCardList, row)
                end
            end
            obj.destruct()
        elseif (obj.type == 'Bag' and obj.getLock() == false) then
            obj.destruct()
        elseif (obj.type == 'Tile' or obj.type == 'Generic') and (obj.getName() ~= 'Mise en place du Chaos Bag' and obj.getLock() == false and obj.getGMNotes() ~= 'board' and obj.getName ~= "Sauvegarde") then
            obj.destruct()
        end
    end
    Wait.time(function()
        for _, data in ipairs(memoryTable) do
            spawnObjectData({ data = data })
        end
        if playerCardList ~= {}

        then
            local spreadValue = #playerCardList
            local startpos_x
            if spreadValue % 2 ~= 0 then
                local n = (spreadValue - 1) / 2
                startpos_x = -(2.33 * n + 1.165)
            else
                local n = spreadValue / 2
                startpos_x = -2.33 * n
            end
            Wait.time(function()
                cardSpawner.call('spawnCardSpread',
                    {
                        cardList = playerCardList,
                        startPos = { x = 6.00 + startpos_x, y = 4.49, z = -11.50 },
                        maxCols = spreadValue + 1,
                        rot = { x = 0.00, y = 180.00, z = 0.00 },
                        sort = false,
                        callbackParams = nil
                    })
            end, 1)
            broadcastToAll('Scénario réinitialisé', { 0, 0.75, 0.75 })
        end
    end, 2)
end
